title: Una semana solos - A Week Alone (2007 - Argentina) subtitles
description:
Una semana solos (2007 - Argentina)                             A Week Alone

Comedy / Drama
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0978833/


Munich Film Festival - WON - Best International Film

Celina Murga's second feature A Week Alone is a subtle examination of a group of rich Argentine children living in an exclusive gated community located a comfortable distance from Buenos Aires. With their parents temporarily away on a trip, and the only adult around an unintrusive maid, the group of siblings and cousins are left to govern themselves and live as they please, exploring the possibilities of freedom as if in a contemporary, though certainly less urgent version of Lord of the Flies. Events progress slowly and without artifice, and eventually you realize you have entered a very private, nuanced world within a world, where secret motivations surface and unwritten social rules are quietly tested and enforced.

Despite seemingly opposite styles, Martin Scorsese was so impressed by director Celina Murga's work, and her "very sensitive, very unique" perspective, that he chose her for his mentorship program, and pronounced A Week Alone, "a film that I can learn from."


Video: XviD, 720x384, 23.976 fps, 1613 Kbps, 01h55m11s
Audio: MP3, 48000 Hz, joint stereo, 192 kbps

DVDRip, Spanish audio, optional subtitles Dutch, English, Russian, Spanish
